alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bay; Inland Bay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 4:01PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Bay County through 430 PM EDT/330 PM CDT/... At 401 PM EDT/301 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lynn Haven, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Callaway, Springfield, Hiland Park, Tyndall Air Force Base, Parker, Bayhead, Southport, Cedar Grove, Dirego Park, Bay Harbor, Recota Beach, College Station, Bayou George, Camp Flowers, Brannonville, Millville and Majette. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
